product.title: Pooh’s Heffalump Movie | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Pooh’s Heffalump Movie

Inspired by the 2005 animated movie, this delightful tale starts with Pooh and his friends hearing mysterious noises in the Hundred Acre Wood. Under Rabbit’s watchful eye, the friends—with the exception of Roo, who’s too small for the task—unite to track down the feared Heffalump. Much to Roo’s surprise, it’s he the Heffalump connects with, and Roo quickly learns first impressions aren’t always accurate.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to name his favorite foods, books, and toys. As he lists his favorites, remind him that he discovered them because he was willing to experiment. Encourage your child to understand the importance of trying new things, as each may lead to a pleasant surprise.
